meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>help</kanji> is a <vocabulary>colonel</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>navy captain</vocabulary>. They go around the seas, helping people in need by fighting the bad guys.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
